item.title: Adding MATLAB LSP support for Emacs (using lsp-bridge mode)
item.description: Install server If you don’t have node and npm installed, install them first. Then, build the matlab LSP language server as follows: 1 2 3 git clone https://github.com/mathworks/MATLAB-language-server cd MATLAB-language-server/ npm install && npm run compile && npm run package After your installation, you need to keep this MATLAB-language-server/ for you use of LSP langserver in Emacs. item.title: Fix issues of Projectile for better project management
item.description:
Customize project detection

We may like to control whether a folder should be guessed as a project root. Sometimes you may see a folder annoyingly being added to project list, e.g., HOME, Dropbox root. This is mostly likely due to default set of a long list for projectile-project-root-files. For better control, it is good to reset it. You may find the policy in the well-written Projectile Docs.
